text: Polina Rahimova (; born 5 June 1990) is an Uzbekistani-born Azerbaijani indoor volleyball player that plays for Brazilian club SESI/Vôlei Bauru and Azerbaijan women's national volleyball team. In December 2015, during her time in Japan, Rahimova achieved 58 points in a single match, setting a world record. ==Awards== ===Individuals=== * 2008-09 Novotel Cup "Best Scorer" * 2008-09 Novotel Cup "Most Valuable Player" * 2008-09 Dubai Volley Tournament "Best Blocker" * 2009-10 Azerbaijan Superleague "Best Scorer" * 2009-10 Azerbaijan Cup "Best Scorer" * 2010 World Championship qualification "Best Server and Best Spiker" * 2010-11 Azerbaijan Superleague "Best Scorer and Best Server" * 2011-12 Azerbaijan Superleague "Best Server" * 2014-15 V-League "Best Scorer, Best Server and Best Spiker" * 2016 European League "Most Valuable Player" ===Clubs=== * 2005–06 Azerbaijan Superleague - Image:Med 3.png Bronze medal, with Nagliyatchi VC * 2007–08 Azerbaijan Superleague - 16px Champion, with Azerrail Baku * 2008–09 Azerbaijan Superleague - 16px Runner-Up, with Azerrail Baku * 2008-09 Novotel Cup - 16px Champion, with Azerrail Baku * 2008-09 Dubai Volley Tournament - 16px Runner-Up, with Azerrail Baku * 2009–10 Azerbaijan Cup - 16px Champion, with Azerrail Baku * 2010–11 Azerbaijan Superleague- 16px Runner-Up, with Azerrail Baku * 2010–11 Challenge Cup - 16px Champion, with Azerrail Baku * 2012-13 Azerbaijan Superleague - Image:Med 3.png Bronze medal, with Azerrail Baku * 2013-14 Azerbaijan Superleague - 16px Runner-Up, with Azeryol Baku * 2014–15 V-League - Image:Med 3.png Bronze medal, with Suwon Hyundai E&C; ===National=== * 2016 European League - 16px Champion, with Azerbaijan * 2017 Islamic Solidarity Games - 16px Champion, with Azerbaijan ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Azerbaijani women's volleyball players Category:Azerbaijani expatriates in Japan Category:Expatriate volleyball players in Japan Category:Expatriate volleyball players in South Korea Category:Expatriate volleyball players in Turkey Category:European Games competitors for Azerbaijan Category:Volleyball players at the 2015 European Games Category:Fenerbahçe volleyballers Category:People from Fergana Category:Opposite hitters Category:Expatriate volleyball players in Italy Category:Azerbaijani expatriates in Turkey Category:Azerbaijani expatriates in Italy Category:Azerbaijani expatriates in South Korea
title: Polina Rahimova
